author: jdonnerstag
msg: fixed crypted URL bug. We must not use Apaches base64 (or any other standard compliant) base64 encoder
as they use "+" and "/" which are dangerous in URLs.

author: ehillenius
msg: fixed lookup which was still directly using httpsession

author: ehillenius
msg: got rid of ISessionStoreFactory and instead implemented a factory method on SessionFacade.
AbstractHttpSessionFacade is now the leading implementation for web application, so that we can access it
quickly/ efficiently, without loosing the top level abstraction of SessionFacade.
